data.message: yo shady hows your lady the fiend that had your baby named haily what the fuck kinda name is that i bet shes crazy u lyk u wish you could go back to the 80's ur white bitch is spoiled dairy milk  learn a tip harris u dont know shit you think jacoby is crazy all of this is bcuz of crackers you all a bunch of crazy 80's those the only sneakers you heard of you whites will make out with whoopie goldberg another black you only heard of  you are white trash just like goldberg u fuckin faggot white cigarette pack rapper goldberg go smash her she's a jump off the balcony that tries to do it backwards in time you must go backwards white ppl all about the shine you said let me turn my dookie lime the only reason ur hair looks nice is bcuz ur a slime crippled they just pretended they didnt leave ur buddy behind eminem homies are shine why u in the light you waste of rhymes  u fuck with busta thats ya only homie yall pay gangsters to hold your line you rap so much your lips get dry and i saw yall laugh at ray charles his lips were dehydrated how did you make it im the best rapper u still in the makin like makin the band aint nobody shakin your hand u fake peter pan if i had cake you would eat it out my hand u a child bcuz you left ya bitch she got you watchin her porno on demand yall have no morals  you retarded ass hell you shower ten times as much as everyone else and still dookie fall out yo ass if everybody ran the train on your woman id pass right by that non moving trailor trash
